quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: They delay, deny, and deflect, and somehow I’m still expected to trust them.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and I’ve told them that trust breaks down when that happens.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: It’s already broken. I can’t rely on them with my safety.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I hear you, and I’ll keep reinforcing that point to them.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Reinforcing doesn’t fix it. Action does.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I agree, but I can only push from my side.

contradictions.issue: Victim highlights broken trust and lack of safety; advocate admits breakdown but offers only reinforcement, no action

timeline_hooks.link: Safeguarding collapse due to trust loss
